content: inspired by the gorgeous shades of wonderfluff ombre this super quick and easy-to-knit lap or baby blanket would make a great gift for anyone super nova is made up of four squares all knit on the bias each square uses one ball of wonderfluff ombre it is a good idea to start all of the squares from the same end of the ball i e start all squares from the darker end use a locking stitch marker to mark the right side of your work to keep track of which side is which
